comment: After the highly disappointing John Wick and this casting update I will now be lowering my expectations for John Wick a great deal. Hopefully they will surprise me with a great film, but I am not holding my breath.
amr:
# ::snt After the highly disappointing John Wick and this casting update I will now be lowering my expectations for John Wick a great deal. Hopefully they will surprise me with a great film, but I am not holding my breath.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / lower-05
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (e / expect-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "John"
                              :op2 "Wick")))
            :ARG4 (d / deal
                  :mod (g / great))
            :time (n2 / now)
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (d2 / disappoint-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :degree (h / high-02))
                        :op2 (u / update-02
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (c / cast-02)
                              :mod (t / this)))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h2 / hope-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (s / surprise-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                        :ARG1 ii2
                        :ARG2 (f / film
                              :mod (g2 / great))))
            :ARG2 (h3 / hold-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (b / breathe-01
                        :ARG0 ii2))))

comment: I think Ruby Rose's character died if you factor in what Wick said to Common. By that, Common should be coming back.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01

            :ARG1 (d / die-01

                        :poss (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Ruby"
                                    :op2 "Rose")))
                  :condition (f / factor-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (s / say-01
                              :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Wick"))
                              :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Common"))))))
      :snt2 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / return-01
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Common"))
                  :ARG4 (t2 / that))))
